__e: That was all about proving that, if everybody pitches in, plain people have a chance.
That's for common people who have to struggle to raise them.
It is undeniable that among the high nobility there is considerable disdain for those of low birth.
I've seen ordinary people among us, trying their best each day to be heroes.
Don't let them have chance to get together. Or else they aren't ordinary people any longer.
"without heroes,we are all plain people and don't know how far we can go.
